game.name: My Tiny Grocery Store - Desktop Idle Supermarket Game
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: My Tiny Grocery Store is an idle shopping simulator located in the bottom right corner of your screen that allows you to manage your store while also completing other tasks! Design your store, arrange your shelves, and enjoy earning money.
game.shortDescriptionEn: My Tiny Grocery Store is an idle shopping simulator located in the bottom right corner of your screen that allows you to manage your store while also completing other tasks! Design your store, arrange your shelves, and enjoy earning money.
